Lloyd L24BC 24 inch (60 cm) LED HD-Ready TV Specifications

General
Brand Lloyd
Model L24BC 24 inch (60 cm) LED HD-Ready TV
Warranty 3 Years
Box Contents Television, Remote Control, Batteries, User Manual, Warranty Card
Display
Type LED
Size(Diagonal) 24 Inch (60.96 cm, Ideal for 3-6 feet viewing distance)
Resolution HD ready, 1366 x 768 Pixels
Local-Dimming No

Brightness 250 Nits
Contrast Ratio 900 :1
Aspect Ratio 16 : 9
Horizontal Viewing Angles 178 Degrees
Vertical Viewing Angles 178 Degrees

Physical Design

Stand Colour Black
Video

Image Formats Supported JPEG
Audio

Output per Speaker 5 W

USB Ports 1

HDMI Ports 1
